intro: Lynxie is a swift and agile feline, known for its iconic spotted coat and impressive leap. Its keen senses help it navigate the dense Iberian forests with ease.
Wolvie is a strong and resilient creature, often seen roaming the wild mountains and valleys. It has a distinctive howl and a deep connection to the rugged Iberian landscapes.
Bruin is a gentle giant, known for its thick fur and powerful stance. It navigates the dense forests and rivers, keeping a watchful eye on its surroundings.
Vultaire soars high in the sky, keeping an eye out for its next meal. Its impressive wingspan and keen vision make it an iconic sight across the Iberian landscapes.
